document.docAuthor: El-Hawagry, Magdi, Soliman, Ahmed Mostafa & Al Dhafer, Hathal Mohammed
document.masterDocTitle: The family Conopidae (Diptera) in Egypt and Saudi Arabia

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: The family Conopidae (Diptera) in Egypt and Saudi Arabia

mods:name.mods:affiliation: Entomology Department, Faculty of Science, Cairo University, Giza, Egypt
Plant Protection Department, College of Food and Agriculture Sciences, King Saud University, PO BOX 2460, Riyadh, Saudi Arabia & Al-Azhar University, Faculty of Science, Cairo, Egypt
Plant Protection Department, College of Food and Agriculture Sciences, King Saud University, PO BOX 2460, Riyadh, Saudi Arabia

subSubSection.paragraph: Conops antiqua Wiedemann, 1830: 239. Type locality: Egypt.
Conops arabica Macquart, 1851: 134. Type locality: Saudi Arabia (Jeddah).
Physocephala furax Becker, 1913: 612. Type locality: Iran.
Physocephala syriaca Kroeber , 1915: 72. Type locality: Egypt (Cairo) & Palestinian West Bank (Jericho).
Physocephala obscurifacies Kroeber , 1924: 67. Type locality: Egypt (Wadi Hoff).

subSubSection.paragraph: AF: Egypt [as "Gebel Elba"], Saudi Arabia [as "South-western part"], United Arab Emirates, Yemen. PA: Afghanistan, Algeria, China, Cyprus, Egypt, Greece, Iran, Iraq, Israel, Italy, Jordan, Kazakhstan, Kyrgyzstan, Mongolia, Palestinian Territories, Russia, Saudi Arabia (Jeddah), Syria, Tunisia, Turkey, Turkmenistan.

Local distribution and dates of collection (Fig. 5 ): EGYPT: Coastal Strip: Abu-Kir, Dekhela, Mariout (April to August); Eastern Desert: Abu Sueir, Cairo-Suez Road, El-Mallah, Geneifa, Ismailia, Wadi Asal (30 km S. Kosseir), Wadi Digla, Wadi El-Maskhara, Wadi Garawi, Wadi Gharagid, Wadi Hoff, Wadi Ibtadi, Wadi Rishrash (February to September); Fayoum: Kom Osheem (May, August and November); Gebel Elba: locality unknown (January); Lower Nile Valley and Delta: Abu-Rawash, Barrage, Burgash, Cairo, El-Katta, El-Magadlah, Ezbet El-Nakhl, Helwan, Kafr Hakim, Kerdassa, Maadi, Mansouriah, Pyramids, Turah (April to October); Sinai: Wadi Gedeirat (June and July); Upper Nile Valley: Kom Ombo (January); Western Desert: Dahshour, Dakhla Oasis (Balat, Ewina & Rashda), Saqqara, Siwa Oasis (March to December) [Sources:
Kroeber (1915a)
,
Kroeber (1924)
,
Kroeber (1927)
, Stuke and Clements (2008) , Stuke (2014) , Azmy (2016) and museum material in EFC and ESEC]. SAUDI ARABIA: Al-Baha: Al-Mekhwa (March); Asir: Marabah (April); Jazan: Abu-Arish Road (Al-Mahdag and Arada), Jazan City (March to May); Makka Al-Mukarramah: Jeddah (date unknown) [Sources:
Kroeber (1915a)
, Stuke and Clements (2008) and collected material].
